artefacts.effect: If any damage points were allocated to this unit this turn, **Heal (3)** this unit.

artefacts.name: Icon of Infinite Excess
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.lore: Slaanesh’s most opulent standard drives both followers and enemies of the Dark Prince into orgiastic fits of violence.
artefacts.declare: Pick a non-**HERO HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Celebrity Warlord
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
heroicTraits.lore: This hero has gained a cult following that seeks them out on the battlefield.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO SYBARITE** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

heroicTraits.name: Master of Temptation
heroicTraits.lore: Twisting the old adage, this hero demonstrates that good things do not come to those who wait.
heroicTraits.declare: You can only use this ability if your opponent has any **temptation dice**. Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, while your opponent has not used any of their **temptation dice** to replace a roll for the target this turn, the target can only use **CORE** abilities.

heroicTraits.name: The Need For Perfection
heroicTraits.lore: This hero inspires a compulsive, self‐destructive desire in their allies to push themselves ever further, all thoughts of temperance and restraint dismissed from their minds.
heroicTraits.effect: The first time each turn that an unmodified charge roll, casting roll, unbinding roll or banishment roll for a friendly non-**EUPHORIC** unit wholly within 12" of this unit is 5 or less, that unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Strongest Alone
heroicTraits.lore: This hero fights most fiercely on their own, lest their followers sully their greatness with their lesser presence.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s attacks while it is more than 6" from all other friendly units.

heroicTraits.name: Into the Fray
heroicTraits.lore: The first blow struck is the sweetest, and this warlord makes sure they slake their desire for violence with force and skill.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Glory Hog
heroicTraits.lore: This hero wants nothing more than to revel in the defeat of their enemies.
heroicTraits.effect: If an enemy **HERO** is destroyed by this unit, this unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: An Excess of Depravity
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: Wherever the Hedonites of Slaanesh roam, reality is unmade. Those who stand against them are assailed by titillating phantasms and mind-bending illusions until they become slaves to their own base urges.
battleTraits.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** units to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
The targets have the **EUPHORIC** keyword for the rest of the battle round.

In addition, for each friendly unit you pick, give your opponent 1 **temptation dice**. During this battle round, instead of making a wound roll, save roll, ward roll or run roll, your opponent can use 1 temptation dice to replace the roll they would have made with a 6, or instead of making a charge roll they can use 2 temptation dice to replace 2 of the dice in a charge roll with two 6s (other dice could then be rolled normally). Rolls that have been replaced count as unmodified rolls and cannot be re-rolled. You cannot use temptation dice to replace a re-roll.

Each time your opponent uses a **temptation dice**, they must roll it. On a 1-2, your opponent’s roll is replaced by that value instead of a 6, and you must allocate D3 damage points to the unit for which the roll was replaced immediately aer the ability used by that unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

At the end of the battle round, any **temptation dice** that have not been used are lost.

battleTraits.name: Euphoric Killers
battleTraits.lore: The followers of Slaanesh revel in slaughter, the thrill of battle sending them into an electrified frenzy as they mutilate their foe.
battleTraits.effect:
While a friendly unit has the **EUPHORIC** keyword:

• That unit’s weapons, including **Companion** weapons, have **Crit (2 Hits)**.
• That unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

**Designer’s Note**: *Note that ‘Sadistic Spite’ does not affect **Companion** weapons.*
